Error.Name: Undefined error
Error.Definition: Unknown error

Error.Name: Registration was failed!
Error.Definition: When creating a user error has occurred.

Error.Name: CAPTCHA is invalid!
Error.Definition: User has not passed CAPTCHA.

Error.Name: Email unconfirmed!
Error.Definition: You need to go on the mail and confirm the registration.

Error.Name: The data was not entered!
Error.Definition: Please enter your login details.

Error.Name: Wrong password!
Error.Definition: Please enter correct password.

Error.Name: Not registered!
Error.Definition: You are not registered, please register.

Error.Name: Wrong email code or userId!
Error.Definition: Your email identity code or userId are wrong.

Error.Name: Data was not enter!
Error.Definition: Please enter first name and last name

Error.Name: Email was not enter!
Error.Definition: Please enter your email.

Error.Name: Is registered!
Error.Definition: User with the same name already exists.

Error.Name: User was not found!
Error.Definition: User with this id was not found

Error.Name: Password is too short
Error.Definition: Passwords must be at least 6 characters.

Error.Name: Password without non digit character
Error.Definition: Пароль должен содержать хотя бы один специальный символ и число.

Error.Name: Password without one lowercase
Error.Definition: Passwords must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').

Error.Name: Password without one uppercase
Error.Definition: Passwords must have at least one uppercase ('A'-'Z').

Error.Name: Password is rquired
Error.Definition: Passwords is required field.

Error.Name: Incorrect e-mail!
Error.Definition: Please enter correct e-mail.

Error.Name: E-mail was not entered!
Error.Definition: Please is required field.

Error.Name: Success!
Error.Definition: Successful operation

Error.Name: Success LogIn!
Error.Definition: You have successfully LogIn

Error.Name: Registration was successful!
Error.Definition: For 20 minutes on your mail will get a message to confirm your registration.

Error.Name: Success E-mail confirm!
Error.Definition: You e-mail successfully confirmed

Error.Name: Reset password was successful!
Error.Definition: For 20 minutes on your mail will get a message to reset your password.

Error.Name: Password is changed!
Error.Definition: Successful operation. Set new password.

Error.Name: Feedback sent!
Error.Definition: Your feedback successfully sent.
